Texts.Chs: ...ahf'- fm'latgh geb ehye chtenff k'yarnak...
Texts.Eng: ...ahf'- fm'latgh geb ehye chtenff k'yarnak...

Texts.Chs: ...kn'a lw'nafh nilgh'ri ooboshu phlegeth ^red;********^reset; shtunggli...
Texts.Eng: ...kn'a lw'nafh nilgh'ri ooboshu phlegeth ^red;********^reset; shtunggli...

Texts.Chs: 我为我刚才所说的疯言疯语而道歉，船长。随着那可怕生物的死去，我的机能似乎恢复正常了。你应该研究一下那些肉块...扫描仪显示那是令人惊异的生命体。
Texts.Eng: Apologies for the dreadful creepiness sir. My functions appear to have returned to normal with the demise of that horrible thing. You should experiment with those fleshy bits...scans are detecting astounding biological signatures.

Texts.Chs: 很抱歉，船长。我^red;***^reset;已经不能^red;*****^reset;继^red;*****^reset;，我相信我们会^red;*****^reset;...
Texts.Eng: Apologies sir. I ^red;***^reset; and cannot ^red;******^reset; without st^red;******^reset;. I believe we ^red;******^reset; with the switch.

Texts.Chs: 在这个时候，作为AI的我应该负责地对你说，它可能时候^red;******^reset;是^red;******^reset;。我的扫描仪^red;*兹兹兹兹兹兹*^reset;和 ^red;******^reset;超载，我^red;******^reset;我无法抑制。
Texts.Eng: At this point it is my duty as an AI to inform you that it may be time to ^red;******^reset; ^red;******^reset;. My scanners are ^red;*bzzzzzzzzzz*^reset; and ^red;******^reset; are overloading. I am ^red;******^reset; am unable to mitigate.

Texts.Chs: 船长，因为这可怕的暴风雪，一切扫描活动都是无意义的。但我仍然发现了一座^orange;研究中心^reset;，你可以打破这边的岩壁进入。
Texts.Eng: Captain, due to the terrible ice storm I am unable to produce scans with any worthwhile meaning. I can discern that the ^orange;Research Station^reset; can be reached by rapelling down the nearby cliff.

Texts.Chs: 作为AI，在面对这座雕像时我都能感受到不安。这到底是什么样的存在，它们又变成了什么？没有任何已知数据能匹配这个...生物，它将重新定义该地区的历史。
Texts.Eng: Even to an AI this statue is unsettling. What manner of being is this, and what became of them? Nothing ever recorded matches this...thing. Whatever this place is, it will redefine local galactic history.

Texts.Chs: 我^red;*******^reset;？我们应该^red;*******^reset;之前是^red;*******^reset;
Texts.Eng: I ^red;*******^reset; ^red;*****^reset; ? We should ^red;******^reset; before it is ^red;******^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我发现^red;*****^reset;^red;*嗡嗡*^reset;！拿上^red;******^reset;或者^red;******^reset;！
Texts.Eng: I am detect^red;*******^reset; ^red;*buzz*^reset;! Take ^red;******^reset; or it ^red;******^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 有趣。吐舌娃被某种不明的生化试剂感染而突变了。并且它们似乎携带着可怕数量的传染病菌。
Texts.Eng: Interesting. A mutated form of poptop, tainted with some sort of unknown biological agent. I should also point out that they appear rabid, and may possess any number of terrible transmittable diseases.

Texts.Chs: Lagash ni'mofghek Shoggoth! IA! IA! IA! Frek^red;*******^reset; ^red;*******^reset; IA! IA! IA! IA!
Texts.Eng: Lagash ni'mofghek Shoggoth! IA! IA! IA! Frek^red;*******^reset; ^red;*******^reset; IA! IA! IA! IA!

Texts.Chs: 等等...传感器发现了一些东西。
Texts.Eng: Sensors are picking up faint signatures. Stand by.

Texts.Chs: 船长，在进入这个设施时，请务必保持高度警戒。我检测到了相当程度的腐化，这显然不是活跃生命活动的迹象。
Texts.Eng: Sir, might I advise you take the utmost of care when entering this facility? I can detect a fair amount of decomposition, which is usually not indicative of positive life-experiences.

Texts.Chs: 之前你所遭遇的恐怖生物是有机物无机物的混合体，而且似乎他们所携带的分子标记与我们曾经所遭遇的血腥屠杀中发现的分子标记是一致的。我确信某些探险队员确实^orange;转变^reset;成为了这类生物。
Texts.Eng: The aberrations before you register as both organic and inorganic, and they also bear DNA markers that match many of the bloody messes we have passed to reach this point. I believe some of the team were ^orange;changed into^reset; these things.

Texts.Chs: 我们已经越来越深入这里了，我想说赶紧回头吧。这里的建筑与我所能辨认的没有任何相似之处，我也无法识别这里的语言，所以我现在无法提供任何翻译。
Texts.Eng: The further we go, the more I wish to tell you to turn back. This architecture bears no resemblance to cultures I am programmed to recognize, and I can find no known languages with common structure or syntax. I am unable to provide translation.

Texts.Chs: 控制终端似乎在房间的另一头，它应该可以打开实验室的防爆门。我建议你去激活它。
Texts.Eng: There appears to be a locking mechanism on the far wall of this room; likely a failsafe for one of the heavier doors in the lab. I suggest you activate it.

Texts.Chs: 这不可能，一定是我的系统出错了。碳年代测定法显示这些物质在两亿年到四亿年之前就存在了...也许是严寒使其保存了下来。我必须知道更多的信息。请继续前进。
Texts.Eng: This cannot be right. There must be an error in my systems. Carbon dating places the age of this material at somewhere around 1 billion years. It is possible that the cold has preserved it. I must know more. Continue onward, please.

Texts.Chs: 这尊雕像与废墟的影像有几分相似。当然，它们之间有着关键性的区分因素，但它们的建筑风格却并非那么的不同。
Texts.Eng: This sculpture somewhat resembles images of the Ruin. There are key differentiating factors, of course, but the overarching theme is not dissimilar.

Texts.Chs: 天气十分糟糕，你一定感觉非常冷，前方的峭壁应该能提供最低限度的保护。
Texts.Eng: This storm is quite something. Perhaps take shelter in the cliffs ahead. Without a doubt, the mountain wall will provide a barrier between you and the blizzard.

Texts.Chs: 无论这是什么，都不像是我所见过的任何事物。我尝试分析但确实没能得到任何有用信息。而且它仍然在搏动着...
Texts.Eng: Whatever the hell this thing is, it reads unlike anything I have ever seen before. I literally get nothing when I try, yet it moves and pulses...

Texts.Chs: 我建议你小心行事，尽管我十分钦佩你敢于触摸这令人感觉不妙的祭坛的勇气。也许从古老的传说中，我们可以了解它的奥秘...
Texts.Eng: While I applaud your bravery even touching this altar, I would advise caution. It clearly is not a good thing. Perhaps some lore can shed light on how to use it...

Texts.Chs: 尽管此时走为上策，但你仍应留意是否错过了任何文件柜以及实验台。或许能够找到更多可以帮助我们确定这里发生了什么的信息，我们的委托人一定会为这些信息感到感激的。
Texts.Eng: While leaving is a good idea, you should be certain you missed no clues in the filing cabinets and paper piles within the lab. There may be more information to help us determine exactly what went on here, something our client would likely appreciate.

Texts.Chs: 是的，出发吧。这里没有任何已知宇宙物种的生命信号，但我检测到了我们从未见过的生物，请警惕，船长。
Texts.Eng: Yes, there we go. There is one life-sign matching known sentient species. I am also picking up readings that match nothing we have seen before. Tread cautiously, sir.

Texts.Chs: ^red;******滋滋滋滋滋滋******^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^red;*******bzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzt*****^reset;

Texts.Chs: ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh ******* wgah'nagl fhtagn!
Texts.Eng: ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh ******* wgah'nagl fhtagn!
